author: ajsutton
content:
FYI to enable trace logging in Teku that shows all the HTTP calls made to the EL without restarting you can run:
```
curl -X PUT -d '{"level":"TRACE", "log_filter":["tech.pegasys.teku.ethereum.executionlayer"]}' http://localhost:4000/teku/v1/admin/log_level
```

author: ajsutton
content: Also useful for converting between slots and timestamps on different networks: https://slots.symphonious.net
